author: TravisEz13
body:
# Details of the Distribution

- Name of the Distribution: Debian 
- Version of the Distribution: 10
- [x] The version of the Distribution is supported for at least one year.
- [x] The version of the Distribution is not an [interim release](https://ubuntu.com/about/release-cycle) or equivalent.
- [x] The version of the Distribution is [supported by .NET Core](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/3.0/3.0-supported-os.md#linux).
- [x] An issues has been filed to create a Docker image in https://github.com/powershell/powershell-docker

## Progress - For PowerShell Team **ONLY**

- [x] Docker image created - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Docker/pull/250
- [x] Docker image published
- [x] Distribution tested
- [x] Lifecycle updated
- [x] Documentation Updated

comments.author: sirredbeard
comments.body:
This would be very useful.

The stretch installer fails on buster or higher due to dependency issues.

We are tentatively installing the stretch version and stretch dependencies in Pengwin.

Thank you.

comments.author: MartinEtcheverry
comments.body: well , it will be nice install powershell in debian 10 just adding the repo . i am just saying.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @chuanjiao10 	This works, just hasn't been document.  You can see the status here.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: We are not producing a new package as the existing package works.

title: Debian 10 Support
